page.title: 02Watchfield Village
page.content: of Shrivenham. The old village comprises serveral attractive stone-built dwellings and thatched cottages.Adjoining the High Street, near to the A420 lies the council house estate and more recently some flats for senior citizens have been built near to the General Stores. Adjoining the High Street,too,are some Army married quarters which are at present being released for sale to the public.Other married quarters,which lie back from the High Street,form their own estate as part of the Royal Military College of Science;approximately 100 of these married quarters remain unoccupied.
